des: "This fabulous ice-cream pie can be made in any flavor you want!. It's so quick! Racers love it 'cause it's FAST! Use your favorite ice cream, plain old vanilla is fine."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bake crust in preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, until lightly browned. Allow to cool.
Spread ice cream into crust and serve immediately.
